name: Hot Girls Delivery Club
description:
Adventures of the Silent Driver


The orange evening sun fell on the city, and a pleasant coolness was felt in the air. Everything was quiet and peaceful, except for the buzzing of the air conditioner in the car. Thoughts about the future were interrupted by a call. The message from Greta was standard. In a few hours it will be time for the driver to get behind the wheel of his car and head into the night city to rescue the girls from the dirty clutches of the mafia.

Syntwave rest

HGDC is a simple card puzzle with a plot for a couple of evenings in the company of a cool car, dangerous work and nice girls traveling companions. In the tasks you will be helped by fellow racers - the mysterious "White Angel", funny - "Blue Demon", and charming operator Greta. Based on partially real events ;)

From the fans of "Drive":

  • Turn-based card racing!
  • Beautiful girls drawn by hands.
  • Syntwave music.

Get behind the wheel, the girls are already waiting to be rescued!
